advertisements.title: Advertisements
advertisements.pageDescription:
Create advertising content with Luxembourgish text-to-speech technology. Generate audio for radio spots, online ads, and multimedia presentations in Luxembourgish.

**Key Features**

• Natural-sounding Luxembourgish voice
• Cost-effective audio production
• Quick generation from text to audio
• High-quality output

**Applications**

• Radio advertising
• Social media content
• E-learning materials
• Product descriptions

For more information, contact us at vhenz@college.harvard.edu

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.pageDescription:

**Key Benefits**

• WCAG compliance support
• Cost-effective audio generation
• Natural-sounding Luxembourgish voice
• Easy integration

**Who Benefits**

• Visually impaired users
• Users with reading difficulties
• Language learners
• Mobile users
